The main characters are various people who get stranded in the middle of a series of mysterious alien invasions. They have to band together and use their unique skills to survive this nightmare.

Another great recommendation based on your preferences is "You Only Live Twice". It is an action-adventure film directed by John Sturges. The main character is James Bond, the world's most successful spy. James travels to various countries around the world, where he must use his intelligence and bravery to solve various mysteries and prevent various disasters.

Another great recommendation based on your preferences is "Serenity". It is an action drama film directed by Justin Lin. The main characters are River Tam, a telepathic woman who works as a private security consultant; John Barlow, a former member of the legendary band The Grateful Dead; and Simon Wu, a Chinese-American man who works as a special agent for the Federal Bureau of Investigation.

In this film, the three main characters work together to solve various mysteries and prevent various disasters. They use their unique skills such as telepathy, former rock band experience, and special agent training to overcome various challenges and obstacles that they encounter along their journey.

Overall, these are just a few examples of movies that you might enjoy based on your preferences for sci-fi action comedy films directed by Ruben Fleischer and Justin Lin.
